newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China Resources unit closes $175 mln FRN.
newsitem.headline: China Resources unit closes $175 mln FRN.

text.p: CRE Finance (1997) Ltd's US$175 million floating rate note issue has been closed, arranger ING Barings said Thursday.
The deal is guaranteed by China Resources Enterprise.
The facility has a final maturity of five years with no put or call options. The issue was priced at par to float at 62 basis points over the London Interbank Offered Rate.
With fees, the all-in return for top-tier managers is 72 basis points.
BNP Hong Kong, Kleinwort Benson, Sanwa International Finance, Schroders Asia and WestLB are co-arrangers.
ING Bank, Bank Austria, HypoBank, Cariplo Hong Kong, Commerzbank East Asia and Sakura Finance Asia are co-lead managers.
Credito Italiano particapated as a manager.
Bank of Communications, Baden-Wurttembergische Bank and DKB Asia are co-managers.
